2000.title: Y2K Computer Bug
2000.description: The Y2K computer bug, feared to cause widespread computer failures, passes without major incidents as the year 2000 begins.

2000.title: International Space Station
2000.description: The first permanent crew arrives at the International Space Station, beginning continuous human presence in space.

2000.title: Sydney Olympics
2000.description: Australia hosts the Summer Olympics in Sydney, with over 10,000 athletes from 200 nations participating.

2000.title: Bush vs. Gore Election
2000.description: The United States experiences one of its closest presidential elections, resulting in a Supreme Court decision and George W. Bush's victory.

2000.title: Human Genome Project
2000.description: Scientists complete the first rough draft of the human genome, marking a major milestone in genetic research.
